channel.title: Gibbon-Fanatic on ZooBerry
channel.description: Recent content in Gibbon-Fanatic on ZooBerry

item.title: Food Realism Hack
item.description: Adds realistic food options, such as raw shrimp for flamingos.

item.title: Alpine Pack
item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.description: This is part of a set of eight biome packs that were made by the Zoo Admin Design Team many years ago.

item.title: Gibbon Pack
item.description: A pack of three different gibbons to bring some variety to your zoos’ primate sections.

item.title: Glass Fence
item.description: This is the an all glass fence created by Gibbon-Fanatic with help from Penguinman. Enjoy!
